metadata.description: Experiment 1: Core thesis - Embedding Dimension x Training Swarm Size matrix. Tests dimensional reduction hypothesis across 5 training sizes and 7 embedding dimensions.
metadata.optimization_notes: 2 seeds, 500 iterations (n_steps=500, batch_size=128, n_envs=2). max_steps=1000, world_size=100, v_max=5.0. Global observation (no comm_radius) to isolate dimensional reduction effect. Auto-expanded from matrix_parameters.

matrix_parameters.description: Cartesian product: 5 training sizes x 7 embedding dimensions x 2 seeds = 70 unique configs. Auto-expanded via config_utils.py.

_example_num_agents4_embed_dim4_seed0.description: Example: 4 agents, embed_dim=4, seed=0. Policy width auto-scales with embed_dim.

_example_num_agents16_embed_dim64_seed12.description: Example: 16 agents, embed_dim=64, seed=123. Policy width auto-scales with embed_dim.

experiments._abbreviated: Full 70 configs auto-generated from matrix_parameters by config_utils.py. Naming: num_agents{N}_embed_dim{D}_seed{S}
